code: import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import assessments from"./assessments";import common from"./common";import confirm from"./confirm";import loading,{actSetLoading}from"./loading";import{createLoadingMiddleware}from"./middleware/loadingMiddleware";import milestone from"./milestone";import notify from"./notify";import outcome from"./outcome";var loadingMiddleware=createLoadingMiddleware({enableLoadingPayload:{type:actSetLoading.type,payload:true},disableLoadingPayload:{type:actSetLoading.type,payload:false}});export var store=configureStore({reducer:{loading:loading,confirm:confirm,notify:notify,outcome:outcome,assessments:assessments,milestone:milestone,common:common},middleware:function middleware(getDefaultMiddleware){return getDefaultMiddleware().concat(loadingMiddleware);}});
